snippet.title: Blooming Business: Casino First Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A first gameplay trailer for Blooming Business: Casino!🍀 Support us: 💚

• Wishlist the game now on Steam: https://bit.ly/3wAS1Ox
• Join our Discord & participate in playtests: https://discord.gg/GHUWCJe6BT

Meet charming animal characters in Blooming Business: Casino, our tycoon casino game with a drama twist: 
Build and run your own fabulous retro casino. A snazzy, bustling, and exciting joint full of drama and cute animals who are anything but cuddly. Manage your staff, attract new guests, and take care of the charming and dangerous VIPs. How will you make sure the house always wins?

Coming in Early Access on Steam!

Follow us on:
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/BloomingBiz
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bloomingbusinessgames/
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BloomingBusinessCasino
• YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_pXCMhC_SR1N2BXxZeM66A
• Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/bloomingbusinesscasino
• Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/BloomingBusiness/
• Newsletter sign up: https://tinyurl.com/kjhfdy9m

Find out more about Blooming Business: Casino: https://www.bloomingbusiness.games/
Find out more about Homo Ludens: https://homoludens.games/

#indiegames #gaming #gameplaytrailer #tycoon #guerrillacollective
